name: Cylor vs. The Bullets From Hell
name_original: Cylor vs. The Bullets From Hell
description:
While Cylor was exploring the edge of the universe, he accidentally stumbled into a place most unsavory... Welcome To Hell! Engage in battle with the demons from the deep as you fight for your life! Can you hope to survive? Is there a chance to break free? Or is there really no escape from this hell?

Controls

  • Use the mouse to move and aim.
  • Left Mouse fires.
  • Right Mouse deploys a screen-clearing-bomb.
  • Hold the bomb button to speed-up boss text.
  • Esc or P will pause the game.
  • M will mute/unmute the music.

Credits

  • Nate Wiesel (@NateWiesel): Game Design, Art, Programming, Initial Prototyping
  • Joe Pierce (@LBUncleJoe): Game Design, Art, Programming
  • Hinchy (@ItsHinchy): Additional Programming
  • music by SAVESTATES, licensed under CC-BY
